title: Chicken goujons with almond satay sauce and a ponzu dressing
description: Who can resist a crisp chicken dipper with a rich satay sauce? Prepare the vegetables and sauces in advance for a quick dinner with a difference.
ingredients: 2 tbsp dashi stock (available from some large supermarkets)
1 tbsp each of oil and butter
small handful coriander leaves, finely chopped
4 large chicken breasts, skinless and boneless, cut into strips
